name: Home animation slider
author: Noor alam

sections.description:
Home animation slider is nice image and text animation slider wordpress plugin. You can use this plugin any wordpress site for create slider.

Home animation slider is one of the most user friendly wordpress plugin.You can create unlimited animation slider with lots of options by Home animation slider slider.You can set new options for every slider.Home animation slider also support text animation. Home animation slider supports arrow button, text animation, button animation, Animation, Caption, hover caption and much more.

Most powerful features:

  • Multiple image slider.
  • 3 different animation style.
  • 6 layer animation support.
  • Image caption support.
  • Animation button.
  • 3 different image support every single slider .
  • Three different image size supports.
  • User-friendly Editor.
  • CSS3 Animation support.
  • Background change support.
  • Mousewheel support
  • Different position text animation.

Translations

  • English
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

e.g.

First things first, thank you for choosing our Gallery Box lite plugin!

You can install the plugin one of two ways:

Install using FTP

  • Unzip the Home-animation-slider.zip file locally to your machine
  • Connect to your FTP area using your preferred FTP package
  • Upload the Home-animation-slider.zip folder that you extracted from the zip file to the plugin folder of your WordPress installation (wp-content -> plugin)
  • Go to plugin and activate Home animation slider.

Install by WordPress (recommended)

  • Login to your WordPress admin area.
  • Navigate to plugin and click the Add New button at the top.
  • Click the Upload plugin button at the top.
  • Click the Choose File button and locate the Home animation-animation-slider.zip file on your machine and click the Install Now button.
  • On the basis the plugin installs correctly, click the Activate link.
sections.faq:
Can I crate image slider by Home animation slider?

yes, you can create image slider.

Can I crate text animation by Home animation slider?

yes, you can create video slider.

How many slider can I create?

You can create unlimited slider by this plugin with lots of options.

How to include a slider in a post or a page?

[hslider id=”838″]`
